attributes.additional_details:
Our great British Heritage is being eroded by the ongoing demolition of listed historic buildings. Central Government, and also, Local Councils, must be made responsible for their preservation, and, required to deny any planning request, or demolition request, to save our heritage.

All too often, these ancient secular structures, fall into the hands of unscrupulous developers,and suffer the fate of demolition, in the guise of progress, or greed. As a culture, we need to recognise the importance of these rare, and historic buildings, and to let them be handed down to posterity, intact, and returned to their former glory.
